nws.name: Tonight
nws.detailedForecast: Snow before 2am, then snow and areas of blowing snow. Cloudy, with a low around 28. Northeast wind 16 to 33 mph, with gusts as high as 51 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 4 to 8 inches possible.

nws.name: Monday
nws.shortForecast: Heavy Snow And Areas Of Blowing Snow
nws.detailedForecast: Snow and areas of blowing snow. Cloudy, with a high near 30. North wind 18 to 35 mph, with gusts as high as 63 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 11 to 17 inches possible.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Snow likely before 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 22. Northwest wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of 3 to 5 inches possible.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 32. West wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 14. Southwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: Snow before 11am, then rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 38. South wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Chance Rain And Snow then Partly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow before 10pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 29. Southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Chance Light Rain
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow between 11am and noon, then a chance of rain. Mostly sunny, with a high near 39. Southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 7pm, then rain and snow likely between 7pm and 10pm, then rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 30. South wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow. Partly sunny, with a high near 42. West wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

nws.name: Friday Night

nws.name: Saturday
